settings.text: We are more than a little obsessed with thoughtful design – from the most innovative materials to the little details that turn an essential into an infatuation. We partner with the top factories in the world, use only the best materials and craftsmanship, and never stop until our products are truly exceptional – and ready for your home.
We like our luxury with a side of practicality. This isn’t the type of luxury you put on a shelf – though it does look nice there – it’s the kind you live with every day.
Classic design and a low profile means these plates pair just as well with leftover Chinese as with formal China.
Bright, shiny, but understated, our 18/10 stainless steel flatware resists stains and rust and is built to withstand a decade of industrial dishwasher cycles.
Our glasses look and feel like crystal, but are hyper-durable because we believe in dishwashers and overenthusiastic toasts.
Our criminally soft luxe bedding will put you right to sleep – as well as stand up to the full range of bedtime activities.
We all know that the ingredients can make or break a dish. Literally. And since we want your pieces to last for the long haul, we only use the best, most resilient materials.
Our sheets are meticulously crafted from start to finish with the highest degree of bedding craftsmanship in the world.
Combed 100% long-staple cotton produces threads as strong as they are fine – and we pack a 500 thread-count into our crisp and long-lasting percale sheeting.
Our Italian glass is held to the highest standards of clarity, so your focus can always be on the drink inside. And with break-resistant technology, you can heartily enjoy that drink or four.

We use Limoges porcelain clay from France, fired at ultra-high temperatures to create the most refined but durable, lightweight dinnerware. Even better to pass down the table, and to the next generation.
We try to avoid fast-food and fast-fashion – so it’s a no-brainer to ensure that our line is built to outlast trends, the competition and clutsiness.
Our towels are made by spinning cotton fibers with air for greater absorbency and super fast drying. Ultra soft, ultra long-lasting, and ultra cloud-like.
Crafted in Portugal using the highest-quality porcelain, our dinnerware pairs the finest material from France with generations of Portuguese artistry.
Our premium European white duck down packs the best fluff you can find. And it’s machine washable, because you may have great taste, but you have better things to do.
Designing to last also means designing sustainably. So our paper-based packing materials protect your new pieces and are 100% recyclable. Unbox, recycle, rejoice.

Become an expert on the difference between percale, sateen, and everything in-between. We’ve created some helpful guides (remember, we’re obsessed) in our magazine. Care to hop down the rabbithole with us? Visit The Magazine.
